title: "Space Exploration Timeline"
content:
# Space Exploration Timeline

Welcome to our website showcasing the incredible history of space exploration. From the early days of rocketry to the modern spacecraft that explore our solar system and beyond, we have curated a series of images that highlight the key milestones in humanity's journey to the stars.

Our timeline takes you on a visual journey through history, starting with the launch of the first artificial satellite, Sputnik 1, in 1957. You'll see iconic moments such as the Apollo moon landings, the launch of the Hubble Space Telescope, and the first landing on Mars.

Each image is accompanied by a brief description of the event or mission it represents, providing context and insight into the significance of each milestone. Whether you're a space enthusiast or just curious about the history of human achievement, our timeline offers a fascinating glimpse into the past, present, and future of space exploration.

We hope you enjoy exploring our timeline and learning more about the incredible feats of engineering, science, and human determination that have propelled us ever further into the cosmos.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A series of images depicting the progression of space exploration, from early rockets to modern spacecraft."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
